i am 5 3 an love movie time.

participant_2.background:
My favorite color is green because it is the color of nature and it reminds me of the importance of protecting our planet.
i am hoping to find someone to marry me.
i have 10 years experience in our industry , yet she gets promoted.
i was a navy brat and have attended 16 schools in 12 years.
I'm going to take a break from my work on bitcoins and go hiking in the mountains.

content.text: Hello, how is your day going?
Hi there! It is going well, how about yours?
I am doing ok. I am a bit stressed about my weight. I would like to go for a run, but my beer belly is getting in the way.
I understand, I have been there myself. I have found that swimming is a great way to get in shape and it is easier on your joints.
That is a great idea! I love to swim in the lake. I'm a weirdo, but I love swimming in the lake.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I have always wanted to swim in a lake. I grew up on a navy base and we moved around a lot. I went to 16 different schools in 12 years.
Wow, that is a lot of moving around! I have never moved more than once in my life. I am a bit of a homebody.
I am not a homebody, but I do like to settle down in one place. I have been at my current job for 5 years and I am hoping to find someone to marry me.
That is great! I hope you find someone special. I have been married for 5 years and I love my husband very much.
That is wonderful to hear! I am happy for you.
